name: LikeSocialBiz
tagline: SEO & Social Media Expertise Los Angeles
description:
We are a young and dynamic LA-based Digital Marketing company. We also are present in Miami Beach, Palm Springs & Bogota.
 
Our services are essential for any business to succeed. We, "LikeSocialBiz" were chosen by “UpCity” & “Clutch” as one of the Top 10 SEO/Digital Agencies in Los Angeles for the years of 2016 & 2017 and featured on Voyage LA Tending.
Certified by Google 2017  & Yelp Partners in 2018.
 
 
LSB offers a la carte and month-to-month services for your convenience. Let us create custom-made strategies for your individual needs. We can manage single services or create tailored packages.
Our marketing experts specialize in SEO, PPC, SMM, Website creation & Branding.
Want more information? Let’s get together so you can experience what it feels like to have a whole marketing team supporting and helping your business grow.
